title.narrative: NATIONAL ADVOCAY: Effective and Inclusive Peace Building

description.narrative: This project is intending to improve public interest issues advocacy and lobby engagement at the National level. The advocacy and lobby will covers issues associated with peace building and empowerment of women on peace advocacy. Peace building is a key aspect for rebuilding the broken social fabric of South Sudanese due to the on-going violent conflict since Mid. Dec. 2013. The project is aiming at empowering women and civil society on championing peace building at national and regional levels. Women and civil society were selected as actors that influential in the national public affairs advocacy and lobby. The use of peace building as a tool to generated pressure on the conflicting parties of South Sudan and regional actors on effective and timely implementation of the peace agreement provisions. Among the key peace agreement provisions are; institutional and legislations reforms, observation of permanent ceasefire, justice and accountability, national reconciliation and healing security sector reform and economic reforms. The advocacy and lobby will target the central government level targeting the national parliament, independent commissions and executive ministries. This project will be focusing on conducting advocacy and lobby for the effective and timely implementation of the signed peace agreement between the government and the SPLM-IO. Advocacy and lobby for the effective and timely implementation of the peace agreement is as follow; Component 1: Equipping women and civil society with peace building advocacy and lobby skills This component is aiming at empowering women and civil society with knowledge and skills for promoting peace building in South Sudan through engaging national and regional actors on peace building Component 2: Influencing national and regional actors for realization of peace building This component is aiming at creating pressure for the parties to the peace agreement for effective and timely implementation of the agreement.
